name: Test Custom Node Pipeline
dslContent:
pipeline:
  - id: data_loader
    type: DataLoaderNode
    params:
      symbol: "BTC/USD"
      timeframe: "1h"
      dataset: "sample_ohlcv.csv"
      
  - id: custom_aggregation
    type: AggregationNode
    depends_on: [data_loader]
    params:
      operation: "mean"
      columns: ["close", "volume"]
      
  - id: sma_fast
    type: IndicatorNode
    depends_on: [data_loader]
    params:
      indicator: "SMA"
      period: 10
      column: "close"
      
  - id: signals
    type: CrossoverSignalNode
    depends_on: [sma_fast, custom_aggregation]
    params:
      buy_condition: "fast > aggregation_mean"
      sell_condition: "fast < aggregation_mean"
      
  - id: backtest
    type: BacktestNode
    depends_on: [signals, data_loader]
    params:
      initial_capital: 100000
      commission: 0.001
